title: Packers vs Bears recap, Week 1 preview
itunes:title: Packers vs Bears recap, Week 1 preview
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler recap the first game of the 100th season in the TNF showdown between the Packers and the Bears. The heroes then breakdown the latest with Antonio Brown, Ezekiel Elliott and the Jared Goff contract. The season is officially here, the Week One preview starts now.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
